# Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

# Load Data

Data are from fivethirtyeight.com.  

- https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/star-wars-survey
- https://data.fivethirtyeight.com/
- Unless otherwise noted, five thirty eight data sets are available under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License, and the code is available under the MIT License.


```{r}
sw_survey <- read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/star-wars-survey/StarWars.csv")[-1,]

sw_survey
```


# Skim Data

```{r}
class(sw_survey)

glimpse(sw_survey)


skim(sw_survey)
```


## Draft EDA

simplify with rank


```{r}
names(sw_survey)
```

```{r}
sw_skinny <- sw_survey %>% 
  rename(rid = "RespondentID",
         rank = "Please rank the Star Wars films in order of preference with 1 being your favorite film in the franchise and 6 being your least favorite film.") %>% 
  select(rid, rank)
         
sw_skinny
```

```{r}
sw_skinny %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  count(rank) %>% 
  arrange(-n)
```
